pr_title: BIP70 | Broadcast Transaction After Server Ack

timeline.message: Avoid broadcast BIP70 transaction is server did not acknowledge first
Changed the BIP70 payment error message
Fixed the issue with Electrum based BIP70 servers that doesn't provide PaymentUrl

timeline.bodyText: Where does the value of txAlreadyComplete come from? The logic here seems to be that if the tx is completed (wallet.completeTx was called) then it only needs to be committed, otherwise wallet.sendCoinsOffline will complete and commit the transaction.  I suppose this makes sense, so this relates to a comment above about how the value of txAlreadyComplete is set.
